```{r setup}
library(hermes6)
```

Comparisons of speed for different Markov Smoking Probabilistic models.

Functions being tested are.
```{r}
function_names <- ls("package:hermes6", pattern = "markov*")
function_names
```

```{r}
markov_functions <- lapply(function_names, get)
names(markov_functions) <- function_names
microbenchmark::microbenchmark(list = lapply(markov_functions, do.call, list()), times = 5)
```
